geneId.description:
The ID to which the wildtypeExpression ontology term(s) is applied. For this submission,
      these will be genes.

whereExpressedStatement.description: use to provide a human-readable text display for the combination of 1->many ontology terms coded in the whereExpressedTermIdentifiers collection, used as a convenience to reduce code duplication.

publication.description: one publication for which the annotation was made

stage.description: the id that represents the stage of the expression annotation - for groups with no stage, the value of 'N/A' should be used instead.

wildtypeExpressionTermIdentifiers.description: a collection of terms that when used together represent the 'where expressed' piece of an expression annotation.

assay.description: the ECO (ontology) id that represents the assay type of the expression, ie: in-situ.

dateAssigned.description: Date this entity was assigned in it's primary data source.
